description: A leading private higher education provider in Malaysia, comprising universities, colleges, and international schools, part of the Sunway Group.
mission: To be the international education hub in Malaysia.
benefits: Health Insurance, EPF, SOCSO, School Fee Discounts for children, Professional Development

Review Summary: A long-standing and stable company in the automotive industry is a key advantage. However, the culture is very traditional and hierarchical, which can limit innovation and dynamic career growth.
description: A large Malaysian conglomerate with core businesses in the assembly and distribution of motor vehicles, as well as property and financial services.
mission: To be a leading automotive company in the region, delivering quality products and services.
benefits: Health Insurance, EPF, SOCSO, Car Purchase Schemes, Stable Employment

Review Summary: Exposure to a wide range of global IT projects is a key positive. However, the company is often criticized for its below-market salary packages and bureaucratic processes.
description: An Indian multinational company that provides information technology and business process outsourcing services.
mission: To be the most respected global company in our industry, creating value for all our stakeholders.
benefits: Health Insurance, EPF, SOCSO, Global Client Projects, Training

Review Summary: Working for the company behind the popular Massimo brand is a key draw. However, the FMCG manufacturing and distribution environment is very demanding with long hours.
tagline: The goodness of wheat, the taste of Italy
description: The manufacturer of the Massimo brand of bread and other baked goods in Malaysia.
mission: To provide Malaysians with high-quality, delicious, and wholesome baked goods.
benefits: Health Insurance, EPF, SOCSO, Product Allowances, Shift Allowances

Review Summary: A dynamic and fast-paced work environment in the competitive telco industry is valued. However, this often leads to a poor work-life balance and a high-pressure culture.
description: A data-centric and multiple award-winning mobile data service company in Malaysia, known for its competitive mobile plans.
mission: To challenge the status quo and give Malaysians the mobile experience they deserve.
benefits: Health Insurance, EPF, SOCSO, Phone Plan Benefits, Flexible Work, Young Culture

Review Summary: A strong portfolio of well-known personal care brands provides good experience in the FMCG sector. However, the work culture can be traditional and slow-moving.
description: A leading manufacturer and marketer of personal care products in Southeast Asia, with iconic brands like Safi, Enchanteur, and Dashing.
mission: To be the leading personal care company in our markets, creating value for our consumers and stakeholders.
benefits: Health Insurance, EPF, SOCSO, Car Allowance (sales), Staff Discounts

Review Summary: The opportunity to work in a specialized semiconductor foundry with a focus on analog/mixed-signal technologies is a key positive. However, the work is highly specialized and the location may not be for everyone.
description: The Sarawak-based foundry of X-FAB, a leading analog/mixed-signal and MEMS foundry group manufacturing silicon wafers for mixed-signal integrated circuits.
mission: To be the foundry of choice for the analog world.
benefits: Health Insurance, Shift Allowances, EPF, SOCSO, Technical Training, Relocation assistance

Review Summary: The company offers many opportunities for a career in the fast-growing convenience retail sector. However, the operational roles are demanding with long hours and a strong focus on sales metrics.
description: A leading homegrown convenience retail chain in Malaysia, operating myNEWS, myNEWS SUPERVALUE, and WHSmith outlets.
mission: To be the most preferred convenience store brand in Malaysia.
benefits: EPF, SOCSO, Staff Discounts, Career Progression in Retail, Sales Incentives

Review Summary: A good place for entry-level candidates to gain experience in document management. However, the work is very process-driven and can be monotonous, with limited career growth.
description: A company specializing in document management solutions, including digitization, data entry, and archiving services for corporate clients.
mission: To provide reliable, secure, and efficient document management services that help our clients go paperless.
benefits: EPF, SOCSO, Medical Claims, Annual Leave

Review Summary: The company provides exposure to the palm oil and agriculture industry. However, the work environment is often described as traditional with a very hierarchical management structure.
description: A company involved in the plantation sector, focusing on the cultivation and management of oil palm estates.
mission: N/A
benefits: EPF, SOCSO, Housing (for estate staff), Medical

Review Summary: The opportunity to learn about various business and IT consulting projects is a key positive. However, as a small consultancy, the projects and resources may be limited.
tagline: Connecting the Dots for Your Business
description: A boutique consulting firm that provides business advisory and IT solutions to small and medium-sized enterprises.
mission: To help businesses grow by connecting strategy, technology, and execution.
benefits: EPF, SOCSO, Project-based incentives, Flexible Work

Review Summary: The opportunity to work on diverse IT projects provides good learning experience for new developers. However, as a small company, career progression is limited and the benefits package is basic.
description: A Malaysian IT solutions company that provides custom software development, web development, and IT consultancy services for small to medium-sized businesses.
mission: To deliver innovative and practical technology solutions that help our clients achieve their business goals.
benefits: EPF, SOCSO, Annual Leave, Medical Claims
